name: Neko Neko Rampage (Preview)
description:
Neko Neko Rampage is a 4-player party game in which each player controls a rolling cat and has to collaborate to make as much of a mess in the map as possible. To progress in the game, the cats have to accumulate Destruction Points and Golden Yarns, used to unlock the next maps in the story, new playable cat characters and bonus levels.

Neko Neko Rampage is a care-free and chaotic multiplayer experience, focused on the interaction between players and the environment. Each map will present a different challenge that will require players to work together to overcome.
